name: A Plague Tale: Requiem - Protector Pack
summary: This content requires the base game A Plague Tale: Requiem on Steam in order to play.Get the Protector Pack to set out on the right foot in the next chapter of Amicia&rsquos and Hugo&rsquos journey, with an exclusive crossbow skin, extra cosmetics for Amicia, and bonus crafting materials.
